document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Maerklos Villa (labeled 22) on Sulmor Street.
document_data.name: Maerklos Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Maerklos Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Maerklos]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] at the corner of [[Sulmor Street]] and [[Vhezoar Street]], and part of the estate also lay along [[Brondar's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The buildings that composed the villa included one, two and four stories.
